DOC.criteria: Age :1860 year Body Mass Index :18.530 ( kg/m2 ) Nonsmoking , alcohol abusing , bad hobby With regular drug intake e.g . antihypertensive antidiabetes drug history immune , hepatic metabolic disease unsuitable disorder e.g . cancer . unwilling stop regular food supplement e.g . vitamin , herb cooperate design diet History urinary tract infection antibiotic use within previous 3 month
